about_the_game:
In Puppet Team you and your friend will control a single puppet together, if you get along you'll reach your princess, if you don't you'll laugh a lot! You can play with your friends or compete with other teams to reach the princess

No leveling or character customisation here, just pure co-op fun. Whether you're laughing at a failed attempt or celebrating a hard-earned victory, every moment is unforgettable.

The game begins with you and your friend waking up in a mysterious and colourful world full of moving platforms, collapsing bridges and swirling hazards. The environment is both bizarre and dangerous and invites you to step out of your comfort zone and master the art of co-ordination. The goal? To get your clumsy puppet to the castle and reunite with the girl who awaits you at the end of this hilarious but emotionally charged mission.

Translated with (free version)

SWhat to watch:

  • Teamwork | Control the different parts of the puppet and move in harmony with your partner. Adjust your steps, jumps and grabs well, or you could have a disaster!

  • Unlimited Fun | One map, but countless surprises inside! Falling bridges, swinging hammers, timed traps... Everything is here to challenge your reflexes and teamwork!

  • Active Obstacles | Bridges collapse, platforms rotate, some gaps seem impossible! But don't panic, anything is possible if you make the right move at the right time!

  • Live World | A map full of colorful environments, funny physics and surprises! A world that will make you say "What the hell was that?!" at every step!

It's time to challenge other teams with teamwork and a little laughter!

Grab your partner, find harmony and take your puppet to the finals! Prove that you are the most harmonious team in this game full of laughter, fun and unforgettable moments!

name: Puppet Team

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8/10/11 (64-Bit)
  • Processor: Intel i3-4170 @ 3.7Ghz OR Intel i5 750 @ 2.67Ghz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia 650TI OR AMD R7 250x
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 8/10/11 (64-Bit)
  • Processor: Intel i5 750 @ 2.67Ghz or higher
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GTX 970 OR NVidia GTX 1060 3GB OR AMD R9 290x OR AMD RX 470
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 MB available space

short_description: Try to control one person with 2 people! Take the reins with your friends as you try to complete challenging and hilarious missions in this fun cooperative game of teamwork, chaos and comedy!
supported_languages: English, Turkish, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Simplified Chinese, Danish, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Hungarian, Norwegian, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Russian, Swedish
